title: Bug: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description: Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the intended item.
EB: When selecting an item for the first time in the library outline view, the item should be selected and the focus should not jump to the library file node.
SR: Steps to reproduce:1. Open the library outline view.2. Attempt to select any item for the first time.3. Observe that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the intended item.
